text: Aveiro District () is in the central coastal region of Portugal. The capital of the district is the city of Aveiro. == Municipalities == Aveiro District has 19 municipalities: * Águeda * Albergaria-a-Velha * Anadia * Arouca * Aveiro * Castelo de Paiva * Espinho * Estarreja * Ílhavo * Mealhada * Murtosa * Oliveira de Azeméis * Oliveira do Bairro * Ovar * Santa Maria da Feira * São João da Madeira * Sever do Vouga * Vagos * Vale de Cambra Category:Districts of Portugal
title: Aveiro District
